Sentencas: A tensile test method involving shape optimization of a thin, planar specimen has been developed.
Titulo: Optimal shape of thin tensile test specimen

Sentencas: The purpose was to reduce the stress concentration in the transition zone between a straight-sided zone and a wider-end zone.
Titulo: Optimal shape of thin tensile test specimen

Sentencas: Three designs of specimen, including an ISO standard design, were investigated based on finite element analyses.
Titulo: Optimal shape of thin tensile test specimen

Sentencas: The technological applicability of two of the designs was tested on thin, planar cermets corresponding to the structurally supporting member of a planar anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Optimal shape of thin tensile test specimen

Sentencas: Application of optimized shapes appeared as a viable method.
Titulo: Optimal shape of thin tensile test specimen

Sentencas: The maximum stress in the specimen was reduced to < 1.01 times the average stress.
Titulo: Optimal shape of thin tensile test specimen

Sentencas: The fraction of invalid tests (i.e., specimens failing outside the gauge section) was reduced with the optimized shapes.
Titulo: Optimal shape of thin tensile test specimen

Sentencas: The tested samples were cut into shape by laser as actual SOFC components.
Titulo: Optimal shape of thin tensile test specimen

Sentencas: The cutting was seen to generate surface cracks that acted as the main failure initiator.
Titulo: Optimal shape of thin tensile test specimen
